data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Prathapan, Kaniyarikkal Divakaran, Konstantinov, Alexander S., Shameem, K. M., Balan, A. P. (2013): First record of leaf-hole shelters used and modified by leaf beetles (Coleoptera, Chrysomelidae), with descriptions of two new Orthaltica Crotch species from southern India. ZooKeys 336: 47-59, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.336.5435, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.336.5435
